programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera in Brazil is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in wave riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 102 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Four more will punch their tickets into the next round as GLORY & RISE search for the baddest featherweight on the planet in this year long tournament. On the GLORY side, top ranked German Polish fighter Denis Wosik (40-9-1, 9 KO) takes on Thai veteran Suarek (107-40-11, 39 KO) and Italy’s Achraf Aasila (53-13, 13 KO) meets France’s Lounis Saing (19-4-1, 12 KO). Meanwhile on the RISE side of the bracket, Japan’s Yutaro Asahi (17-9, 4 KO) clashes with Spain’s Eduardo Catalin (17-3-1) and top Japanese prospect Yura Kono (15-1, 7 KO) goes up against China’s Dexiang Kong (35-10). In addition to the Last Featherweight Standing matchups, Shiro Matsumoto (53-17-4, 18 KO) defends his RISE...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: On the preliminary card, a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament and other one-off bouts were featured.Mirko Cro Cop was first scheduled to face Pat Barry, and later Sergei Kharitonov on this card. However, on May 21, it was announced that Kharitonov had to withdraw from the fight due to injury. He was replaced by Jarrell Miller.Miguel Torres was scheduled to make his GLORY debut as a participant of the Featherweight tournament. However, on May 28, it was revealed he pulled out of the tournament for undisclosed reasons. He was replaced by Marcus Vinicius.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the world's top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: Paltan
programme.desc: The film showcases an untold story of the Indian forces fighting an intense battle to ward off Chinese infiltration. On Sep. 16, 1965, during the Indo-Pakistan war, China issued an ultimatum to India to vacate the Nathu La Pass, but Major-General Sagat Singh refused. The Chinese turned more aggressive, digging trenches in Nathu La on the Sikkim side of the Sikkim-Tibet border. The Indian army retaliated by building clear fences. All the scuffles led to a full-fledged battle that resulted in the Indian forces destroying many Chinese bunkers until they declared a ceasefire, but suffered great casualties as well.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E55 Jodha Akbar S3 E55
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: While en route to prison, a stray bullet strikes the notorious crime boss Cobra, setting off a chain of events that forces small-time crook brothers Tara and Sitara to flee from the police. During their escape, they unexpectedly find refuge at the home of Major Ram Singh, a tough and disciplined Border Security Force officer. To their surprise, they also find love—Tara falls for Ram's charming sister Pinki, while Sitara is smitten by her best friend Priti. Meanwhile, Cobra is far from defeated; he’s already plotting to break his ruthless brother Panther out of Ram Singh’s jail. But what happens when Tara and Sitara’s true identities are exposed? Can they redeem themselves and help bring...

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.desc: Former Triple Threat Series Champion Colton Eichelberger returns to Monster Jam looking to lead Max D to another freestyle win, but his old rival Tyler Menninga leads the series and attempts to pilot Grave Digger to another event win. Former Rookie of the Year, Nick Pagliarulo returns to Kraken for his series premiere as Stadium Championship Series East heads to Tampa.

programme.title: Championship Series

programme.title: Championship Series

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.desc: Monster Jam goes around the world in this exciting special!

programme.title: Championship Series
programme.sub-title: S2023 : E11 NRG Stadium - Houston, TX
programme.desc: Monster Jam Stadium Championship Series Red returns to Houston as Adam Anderson continues to chip away at Camden Murphy’s series points lead. Will Bakugan Dragonoid remain on top or will Grave Digger regain the lead, and Tom Meents returns to the city where he debuted Max-D twenty years ago.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 31, 32, 33
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Little Big Horn
programme.desc: Rok 1876, Montana. Kapitan Donlin rusza z misją ostrzeżenia Custera przed atakiem Siuksów. Gdy odkrywa romans żony z porucznikiem Haywoodem, łamie rozkazy i decyduje się dotrzeć do celu za wszelką cenę. Misja staje się jego osobistym rozrachunkiem.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Do ostatniej kropli krwi
programme.desc: Billy Gun kradnie żołd wojskowy. Clive Norton ma odzyskać pieniądze, więc uwalnia z rąk kata El Chaleco — brata Billy'ego, który pragnie zemsty. Wspólnie ruszają tropem zdrajcy i złota.

programme.title: Compañeros!
programme.desc: Szwedzki handlarz bronią i meksykański chłop łączą siły, by uratować intelektualnego przywódcę rewolucji. W trakcie misji przytrafiają im się różne przygody.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django jest na tropie bandytów, którzy zgwałcili i zabili jego żonę.

programme.title: Rewolwer za Sto Trumien
programme.desc: Po powrocie z wojny secesyjnej Jim Slade odkrywa, że jego rodzice nie żyją na farmie.

programme.title: Podróżnik z Missouri
programme.desc: Zbiegły sierota, Biarn Turner (De Wilde), próbuje uciec od kłopotów, podróżując na Florydę na początku XX wieku. Trafia do małego miasteczka, gdzie redaktor lokalnej gazety, Doyle Magee (Merrill), postanawia przygarnąć chłopca i dać mu szansę na normalne życie. Zamożny miejscowy farmer, Tobias Brown (Marvin), również interesuje się przyszłością Biarna, ale traktuje młodego człowieka surowo, maskując prawdziwe ukryte uczucia Tobiasa i szczerą troskę. Maniery Biarna i jego chęć niesienia pomocy innym szybko zjednują mu przychylność mieszkańców miasteczka, a on sam udowadnia swoją wartość, przygotowując pozornie niezdolnego do treningu konia do wyścigu, który miasto zorganizuje podczas...

programme.title: Oklahoma Annie
programme.desc: Właścicielka sklepu angażuje się w walkę z korupcją w swoim mieście, Ma także nadzieję przyciągnąć uwagę przystojnego nowego szeryfa.

programme.title: Wspaniały Teksan
programme.desc: Glenn Saxon, Barbara Loy, Massimo Serato, Gloria Osuna.El Desperado (Glenn Saxon) jest twardym, sprawnie władającym rewolwerem właścicielem saloonu, który pomaga meksykańskim chłopom przeciwstawić się okrutnie uciskającemu ich latyfundyście.

programme.title: Najgorszy Rewolwerowiec Dzikiego Zachodu
programme.desc: Ułaskawiona złodziejka zostaje rządową agentką. Aby móc wyruszyć z karawaną na zachód, mieć męża. Wychodzi więc za mąż za naiwnego i niczego niepodejrzewającego dentystę ze wschodniego wybrzeża.

programme.title: Żywy lub martwy
programme.desc: Clay McCord, dręczony napadami choroby i przeszłością, rozważa ofertę amnestii dla bandytów w Tuscosa. Jego decyzja może wpłynąć na losy całego regionu – ale najpierw musi zmierzyć się z własnymi demonami i bronią w ręku.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 34, 35, 36
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Przekręt w cuglach
programme.desc: George Parradine kupuje ranczo jako kryjówkę dla swojej bandy, chcąc oszukać inwestora Josha Taylora. Prawnik i geodeta to tak naprawdę Jack Reynolds, syn zabitego właściciela, który szuka prawdy. Szeryf Rocky Lane, udając rewolwerowca, wraz z Nuggetem Clarkiem próbuje odkryć spisek.

programme.title: Wojownik z równin
programme.desc: Jim Dancer, były bandyta, staje się szeryfem w Kansas, próbując zacząć nowe życie. Po tragicznych wydarzeniach z przeszłości, przyjmuje tożsamość detektywa Cummingsa. Jako szeryf walczy z przestępczością i korupcją w miasteczku, jednocześnie stawiając czoła zemście Berta Slocuma, brata zabitego przez niego mężczyzny.

programme.title: Nieznajomy na koniu
programme.desc: Sędzia Rick Thorne próbuje wymierzyć sprawiedliwość w miasteczku rządzonym przez potężnego ranczera. Aresztuje jego syna za morderstwo i rusza w niebezpieczną podróż, by zapewnić uczciwy proces. Czy uda mu się pokonać korupcję i zyskać zaufanie Amy Lee?

programme.title: Kalifornijski szlak
programme.desc: Właściciel saloonu zostaje wrobiony przez wspólnika w napad na dyliżans. By oczyścić swoje imię, wyrusza w desperacką podróż pełną niebezpieczeństw. W tym samym czasie los łączy go z kobietą, która także walczy o przetrwanie. Razem stawiają czoła przeciwnościom na Kalifornijskim szlaku.

programme.title: Za Kilka Dolarów Mniej
programme.desc: Urzędnik bankowy i jego kuzyn, "generał", łączą siły, by wytropić meksykańskiego banitę.

programme.title: I Rzekł Pan do Kaina
programme.desc: Mężczyzna mści się na rodzinie, przez którą został niesłusznie skazany na dziesięć lat ciężkich robót.

programme.title: Czterej Zabójcy Sartany
programme.desc: Siedmiu zamaskowanych bandytów porywa młodą Susy, kuzynkę burmistrza Clayton City, Franka Clonny'ego. Frank przyjmuje 15.000 dolarów okupu, którego żądają bandyci i obmyśla plan, który pozwoli mu odzyskać pieniądze i schwytać bandytów.

programme.title: Buddy jedzie na zachód
programme.desc: „Doktor” i Indianin Girolamo trafiają do wioski na Dzikim Zachodzie, gdzie są świadkami terroru ze strony gangu i skorumpowanego szeryfa, który odkrył złoto pod ziemią. Bohaterowie decydują się pomóc mieszkańcom w walce o sprawiedliwość i pozbycie się przestępców.

programme.title: Szlak Cariboo
programme.desc: Jim Redfern marzy o ranczu i stadzie bydła. Wyrusza w drogę z przyjaciółmi, ale spotykają Franka Walsha, który ich prześladuje. Po ciężkiej ranie Mike’a Evansa i konflikcie, Redfern musi walczyć o marzenia, gdy odkrywa złoto.

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Joshua - Czarny Jeździec
programme.desc: Joshua, czarnoskóry weteran wojny secesyjnej, wraca do rodzinnego miasta, by odkryć, że jego matka została zamordowana przez biały gang. Zdeterminowany, by wymierzyć sprawiedliwość, staje się łowcą nagród i wyrusza na brutalną, pełną niebezpieczeństw misję zemsty.

programme.title: Noc Węża
programme.desc: Hernández, dowódca garnizonu w małej wiosce, dołącza do grupy mieszczan, którzy chcą ograbić młodego chłopca - Manuela - ze spadku.

programme.title: Mściciel
programme.desc: Clay Hardin chce porzucić odznakę, ale gdy bandyta zabija szeryfa, rusza w pościg. Dołącza do niego łowca nagród i tajemnicza kobieta. Trop prowadzi na terytorium Apaczów, gdzie odkrywają plan sprzedaży broni Indianom.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Córka Belle Starr
programme.desc: Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis zabija Belle Starr i przejmuje gang. Nowy szeryf Tom Jackson zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o jej śmierć przez jej córkę Rose. Aby oczyścić swoje imię i zyskać jej zaufanie, rusza tropem gangu. Western o zemście, odkupieniu i walce o sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Tylko Waleczni
programme.desc: Mało lubiany dowódca kawalerii zostaje przez swój oddział niesprawiedliwie obwiniony za śmierć jednego z oficerów. Musi teraz odkupić winy i udowodnić swoim ludźmi, że się mylili.

programme.title: Niesłusznie oskarżeni
programme.desc: Trzej kowboje, Wes, Vern i Otis, przypadkowo trafiają do kryjówki bandytów. Gdy grupa mścicieli atakuje chatę, Wes i Vern uciekają, lecz zostają omyłkowo uznani za członków gangu. Ścigani przez prawo, muszą udowodnić swoją niewinność, zanim dopadnie ich niesprawiedliwa kara.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado to uzbrojony, zawodowy hazardzista. Przyjeżdża on do małego miasteczka Silver Mine, gdzie wda się w walkę z niejakim Tucanem. Djurado zdobędzie połowę miejscowego saloonu, którego druga część należy do Barbary.

programme.title: Prawo Dana Candiego
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach, tragiczna historia uciekiniera z Saskatchewan Almighty Voice (Gordon Tootoosis), Indianina Cree, którego aresztowano za kradzież państowej własności.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Zwą Mnie Alleluja
programme.desc: Generał Ramirez walczy o rewolucję w Meksyku przeciwko europejskiej dominacji. Wynajmuje Hallelujah, tajemniczego rewolwerowca, by zlikwidował europejskiego cesarza Maksymiliana, przejmując sakiewkę z klejnotami, która miała być przeznaczona na zakup broni.

programme.title: Dobrze Jest Ufać... Ale Lepiej Strzelać
programme.desc: Napad nie udaje się z powodu śmierci przywódcy bandytów. Trzech rabusiów próbuje uzyskać łup. Wieść się rozchodzi i inni dołączają do walki o gotówkę.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Requiem dla Gringo
programme.desc: Wyjątkowy eurowestern, którego bohaterem jest astrolog noszący garnitur w panterkę.

programme.title: Falsyfikat
programme.desc: Daniel Jakor jest jednym z najbardziej płodnych i odnoszących sukcesy artystów, o jakich świat nigdy nie słyszał. Walcząc o sprzedaż własnej sztuki, wkrótce odkrywa, że jego prawdziwy geniusz nie polega na tworzeniu własnych dzieł, ale na fałszowaniu wielkich mistrzów, którzy przyszli przed nim.

programme.title: Nadzieja tańczy
programme.desc: Hope Douglas ma marzenie, aby zostać baletnicą. Jej rodzice chcą, żeby jednocześnie trenowała softball i ćwiczyła balet. Kiedy dochodzi do tragedii, Hope musi dokonać trudnego wyboru, który zadecyduje o jej losie. W którą stronę pójdzie?

programme.title: W Kręgach W Zbożu
programme.desc: W Kręgach W Zbożu. Ukryty świat kręgów w zbożu jest zagrożony, gdy ambitna dziennikarka telewizyjna planuje ujawnić prawdę. Dziennikarka zagłębia się w świat mitologii celtyckiej i UFO, aby odkryć zarówno piękno, jak i niebezpieczeństwo jakie niesie ze sobą prawda, której poszukuje.

programme.title: Morderstwo Nad Rzeką Wolf
programme.desc: Dwóch najlepszych przyjaciół szuka ucieczki ze świata pełnego niebezpieczeństw.

programme.title: Szukając łaski
programme.desc: Zmagająca się z trudnościami i na skraju rozpadu rodzina staje przed nowymi wyzwaniami. Wystawią one na próbę ich wiarę w Boga i wiarę w siebie nawzajem.

programme.title: Długi John Silver: Powrót na wyspę skarbów
programme.desc: Long John Silver trafia na Karaiby, gdzie dowiaduje się o porwaniu córki gubernatora i Jima Hawkinsa przez pirata Mendozę. Silver planuje ich ratunek, licząc też na zdobycie statku i powrót po skarby. Jednak misja szybko okazuje się znacznie trudniejsza, niż zakładał.

programme.title: Pomiędzy Światami
programme.desc: Opowieść o młodym pisarzu, który próbuje pogodzić się z dziewczyną i przetrwać zawiłości nocnego życia stolicy, korzystając jedynie z pomocy swoich imprezujących, dowcipkujących przyjaciół, którzy ciągną go od jednego londyńskiego nocnego lokalu do drugiego.

programme.title: Domek do wynajęcia
programme.desc: Szkocka posiadłość staje się centrum szpiegowskich intryg. Alianci, agenci Nazi i tajemniczy goście rywalizują o wynalazek – niemal doskonały celownik bombowy. Wśród nich ewakuowany chłopiec i zestrzelony pilot RAF-u. Czy ktoś zdradzi? Klasyczna intryga w wersji kolorowej i z polskim lektorem.

programme.title: Złamany
programme.desc: Zhańbiona gwiazda sportu uzależniona także od hazardu próbuje zmienić swoje życie dzięki wsparciu swojego fana numer jeden.

programme.title: Rozmyty krąg
programme.desc: Pełnometrażowy, darmowy film w wersji z polskim lektorem - Rozmyty krąg. Film opowiada o kobiecie opłakującej stratę syna po jego zaginięciu dwa lata wcześniej. W pewnym momencie w jej życiu pojawia się tajemniczy mężczyzna z kamerą.

programme.title: Śmiertelny Weekend
programme.desc: Dwie młode pary przed przeprowadzką do różnych miast wybierają się w ostatnią wspólną wycieczkę pod namiot. Niestety, pewne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, a zazdrość zaczyna zbierać żniwo. Weekend przybiera nieoczekiwany i śmiertelnie niebezpieczny obrót.

programme.title: Impreza Halloween
programme.desc: Za namową swojej najlepszej przyjaciółki, Erin, samotna dziewczyna bierze udział w imprezie Halloween przyjaciółki. Ma nadzieję znaleźć partnera idealnego.

programme.title: Psychole
programme.desc: Trzy młode kobiety szukają zemsty na sadystycznym drapieżniku.

programme.title: Ostatnia szansa
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna zostaje zwolniony z więzienia. Teraz ma szansę na zmianę swojego życia. Ale ulice się nie zmieniły. Dalej panuje na nich ta sama nienawiść, żal i strach. Właśnie to czeka na niego po drugiej stronie muru. Czy nasz bohater kiedykolwiek odzyska prawdziwą wolność?

programme.title: Samce Alfa
programme.desc: Komiczne spojrzenie na to, jak zachowania mężczyzn i kobiet bardzo mało ewoluowały od czasów jaskiniowców...

programme.title: Siostrzeństwo
programme.desc: Cassie cierpi na powracające wizje morderów, z którymi radzi sobie malując brutalne sceny na płótnie.

programme.title: Metoda Menkoffa
programme.desc: W tej satyrycznej komedii introwertyczny pracownik banku, David Cork, łączy siły z człowiekiem od zadań specjalnych Ruby Jacksonem, by pokonać złego guru HRu - Maxa Menkoffa.

programme.title: Trumna w Salonie
programme.desc: Po otrzymaniu pocztą pustej trumny, życie młodej kobiety zostaje wywrócone do góry nogami. Bohaterka będzie chciała dowiedzieć się kto i dlaczego wysłał jej trumnę.

programme.title: Tajemniczy miliarder
programme.desc: Komedia romantyczna w wersji z polskim lektorem - Tajemniczy miliarder. Przezabawne perypetie przystojnego biznesmena, który pod przykrywką "bezdomnego miliardera" udaje się do Nowego Jorku.

programme.title: Kintsukuroi - nawet rozbici możemy stać się piękniejsi
programme.desc: FBI agentka McKenzie „Max” De Ridder, po stracie matki, popada w żałobę, przez co zostaje zawieszona w pracy. Szukając ukojenia, trafia do małego miasteczka, gdzie poznaje Freddiego, chłopca chorego na rzadką chorobę. Mądrość Freddiego pomaga McKenzie odnaleźć nadzieję, a ich więź prowadzi do niespodziewanej relacji z jego matką. Skomplikowane emocje i siła bezwarunkowej miłości przemieniają życie bohaterów w tej opowieści o uzdrowieniu.

programme.title: Miłosne Chwyty
programme.desc: Studenci college'u ryzykują wszystko, aby zdemaskować tajny projekt wojskowy mający na celu "uzbrojenie" miłości.

programme.title: Sylwetki
programme.desc: Aamod jest emerytowanym dyrektorem wykonawczym i playboyem, który mieszka samotnie w swoim wielkim apartamencie w centrum Chicago; Nadia jest prawniczką, która jedzie właśnie zobaczyć swoich konserwatywnych muzułmańskich rodziców po raz pierwszy od ponad dekady.

programme.title: Gdybyś Tylko Wiedział
programme.desc: Jest to historia Louise, projektantki mody, u której w młodym wieku rozwija się Alzheimer, prawdopodobnie dlatego, że za młodu była maltretowana przez swojego chłopaka.

programme.title: Strefa kwarantanny
programme.desc: Co się dzieje, gdy wybucha epidemia, ale jesteś trzymany w niepewności? Film. Wszystko może się zdarzyć. Powoli mieszkańcy zdają sobie sprawę, że wszyscy zginą, jeśli nie zjednoczą się ze sobą.

programme.title: Nazi Dawn
programme.desc: Siostry z braterstwa studenckiego jadą do letniego domku jednej z nich. Ten okazuje się być nawiedzony przez nazistowskiego mordercę.

programme.title: Rzeź Lekarstwem na Wszystko
programme.desc: Vet prowadzi swoją drużynę rozwiązanych najemników do zdradzieckiego Gallows Wood na ostatnią misję, by schwytać nieuchwytnego profesora Blacka.

programme.title: Przetrwaj albo zgiń
programme.desc: Młoda dziewczyna ucieka przed wojną domową. Przez pomyłkę ląduje w odległej, niezamieszkanej części Australii. Teraz musi dotrzeć jakoś do cywilizacji. Będzie walczyć z głodem, naturą i... Myśliwym chcącym zemścić się na dziewczynie za śmierć syna.

programme.title: Królestwo Piachu
programme.desc: Królestwo Piachu. W piwnicy, gdzieś w rozdartym wojną Bagdadzie, zakładnik Adam Smith czeka na śmierć.

programme.title: Pamiętniki Szekspira
programme.desc: Odkryto dawno zaginione dzienniki wielkiego Barda. Współczesna wersja.

programme.title: Bez Nakazu
programme.desc: Młody detektyw łączy siły z doświadczonym policjantem pod przykrywką, by rozwiązać sprawę brutalnego morderstwa popełnionego przez gangsterów.

programme.title: Przekraczając granice
programme.desc: Szeryf z teksańskiego miasteczka zakochuje się w nielegalnej imigrantce z Ameryki Łacińskiej. Gdy okazuje się, że była świadkiem morderstwa na granicy, ich uczucie zostaje wystawione na ciężką próbę. Miłość, lojalność i prawo ścierają się w cieniu granicznej przemocy.

programme.title: Szczęśliwie Rozwiedziony
programme.desc: Kiedy rozwiedziony mężczyzna wygrywa milion dolarów, jego podstępna była żona nie cofnie się przed niczym, by dostać w swoje ręce wygraną.

programme.title: Drugoklasista
programme.desc: Grupa licealistów przeżywa wiele przygód w ciągu swojego dziesiątego roku nauki.

programme.title: Flip i Flap W Legii Cudzoziemskiej
programme.desc: Flap zakochuje się w Georgette, córce hotelarza, ale dowiaduje się, że jest już żoną oficera Legii Cudzoziemskiej. Złamany sercem, Flap wstępuje do Legii, zabierając ze sobą Flipa. Oskarżeni o dezercję, zostają skazani na rozstrzelanie, ale udaje im się uciec samolotem, który ostatecznie rozbijają.

programme.title: Oddaj Forsę Draniu
programme.desc: Laurel i Hardy udają zespół muzyczny w czasie wojny i wpadają w aferę z tabletkami benzynowymi. Spotkanie uroczego oszusta, którego matka została oszukana, sprawia, że duet zmienia strony. Postanawiają przechytrzyć prawdziwych naciągaczy i odzyskać 10 000 dolarów, wywołując klasyczny komediowy chaos.

programme.title: Schowajcie swoje smutki
programme.desc: Eddie Smith, kolega z wojska głównych bohaterów, ginie w okopach we Francji osierocając tym samym swoją córkę. Po zakończeniu wojny bohaterowie filmu wracają do domu i próbują odnaleźć ojca Eddiego, by przekazać mu dziewczynkę. Niestety, ciągle trafiają na niewłaściwych Smithów. Przy okazji zakłócają jeden ślub, ogłaszając córeczkę Eddie'go dzieckiem pana młodego... Żeby nie mieć do czynienia z opieką społeczną, uciekają z miasta. Zbierając pieniądze na ucieczkę, zostawiają wózek z lunchem... Przypadkowo ogłuszają też prezesa banku i będą ścigani za napad na bank.

programme.title: Inne Słońce
programme.desc: Po przeprowadzce z Szanghaju do Niemiec chińska rodzina zmaga się z aklimatyzacją w nowej kulturze.

programme.title: Głupcy ze złota
programme.desc: Kiedy odnoszący sukcesy rodzinne mężczyzna zostaje zwolniony z pracy, wyrusza z przyjaciółmi na wyprawę w góry Sonory w poszukiwaniu złota. Nie wie, co się tam czai, gdzie woda jest naprawdę głęboka.

programme.title: Rozstępy
programme.desc: Po śmierci ojca, Lyle Bennett wyrusza w ekstremalną podróż utraty wagi w nadziei osiągnięcia zdrowia i szczęścia. Jego cel będzie pchać go poza jego fizyczne granice i przetestować siłę jego psychicznej i emocjonalnej stabilności.

programme.title: Ognista Wyspa
programme.desc: Nowoczesna wersja "Czarnoksiężnika z Oz" o młodej kobiecie, która po tragedii próbuje odnaleźć drogę do domu. Życie Mimi wywróciło się do góry nogami! Ze szczęśliwej żony zmieniła się w roztrzęsioną wdowę i roztrzepaną kochankę, mając zaledwie trzydzieści lat. Jest zdeterminowana, by odnaleźć drogę powrotną do szczęśliwego życia. Podróż Mimi rozpoczyna się na Fire Island.

programme.title: Daughter of the West
programme.desc: A FLAMING PAGE FROM AMERICAN HISTORY Becomes a powerful motion picture...set against the panoramic grandeur of the West!. Martha Vickers stars as Lolita Moreno, a convent raised woman in the 1880s who learns about her Native American heritage through her relationship with an educated Navajo. Morena had been raised at a California mission, but when she leaves to teach school in Arizona, the threads of her mysterious past are revealed. This leads to her involvement with some dangerous people, and a chance to find love in the most unexpected way. The cast includes Phillip Reed, Donald Woods, William Farnum and Milton Kibbee. Pedro de Cordobaa stars as Chief Wykomas.

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers appeared in several Republic Pictures during the 1930s, and this is considered one of their best. It's about a mysterious murder at an archeological expedition, which leads the three prairie pals into some dangerous territory. Can they solve the murder without losing their own lives? The cast includes Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, and Roger Williams, all trying to survive a hail of poison arrows and hot lead!

programme.title: Red Ryder: Roll, Thunder, Roll!
programme.desc: Red Ryder finds two silver conchas, the trademark of bandit El Conejo, at a raided ranch. He reports the raid to Marshal Bill Faugh but tells him that he suspects that El Conejo, a Robin Hood type character, is being framed.

programme.title: Ridin' the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death)!

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires outlaw Johnny Logan to help him with his cattle drive. Logan, going by the name Sam Jackson, joined with a plan to kill the sheriff of a nearby town.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After shooting Luke Grayson in self-defense, Ben Cartwright must protect himself from Graysons son, Todd, who seeks to avenge his fathers death.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights try to invalidate a Spanish land grant to stop the De La Cuesta family from taking part of the Ponderosa and all of the Carson Valley settlers' land.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam Cartwright finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.Starring Michael Landon as Little Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kate's Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter is suspected of murder in this stirring production from writer/director Alan Le May (best known for writing The Searchers). John Drew Barrymore stars as Cooncat, a troubled young man who has to steal to survive. With no friends in West Texas, he falls in with some bad customers who involve him in some terrible crimes. The strong cast includes Chill Wills, Jack Elam, and John Archer, with cinematography by Oscar winner W. Howard Greene.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: When a boy is captured by a Native American tribe after his family is massacred, he finds solace in befriending a wild colt. Years later, following his escape, he is recaptured by a tribe who force him to battle their vicious devil horse. Yet, the horse looks familiar. Is this mysterious devil horse and the wild colt he knew years earlier one and the same? Produced by Hal Roach, who wrote the script with an assist from Stan Laurel, this little treasure was the fourth of 15 features to star Rex the Wonder Horse!

programme.title: Diamond Trail
programme.desc: Diamond Trail is an epic that starts in the speeding taxicabs and illegal barrooms of the east coast, and travels west for its exciting climax. Reporter Speed Morgan (Rex Bell), going undercover as Frisco Eddy, infiltrates Flash Barrett's gang in order to bring them all to justice. But can he get the job done before they learn his identity? With a cast that includes Frances Rich and Bud Osborne, this action tale from director Harry L. Fraser (The Last of the Clintons) is another forgotten classic from Monogram Pictures.

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: Johnny Carpenter (who also wrote the screenplay) stars as Red River Johnny, a gunslinger returning to his home town to clear his name of some heinous accusations. This low budget howler was the only feature directed by Reg Brown, who was better known as an editor and a director of television shows. If Ed Wood directed a western, it might have looked like this one. Enjoy!

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Gene Autry stars as a ranch foreman who helps a beautiful young ranch owner who faces the opposition of local ranchers after bringing a flock of sheep into cattle country. Along with the traditional title song, musical numbers include Youre the Only Star In My Blue Heaven, Buffalo Gals, and Give Me a Pony and an Open Prairie. This Republic Pictures gem includes the usual stock company of actors, with the matchless Smiley Burnette as Genes comical sidekick, Frog Millhouse. Directed by Joseph Kane; written by Gilbert Wright, Betty Burbridge; Also starring Polly Rowles, Ruth Bacon, and George Chesebro.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.desc: Link and Evie Tabor, struggling to work their ranch after a rodeo accident leaves Link in a wheelchair, find themselves vulnerable to outlaws. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the Peters family, seemingly angry at the world and desiring nothing but to be left alone, arrives in Diablo, Annie, Tagg and Lofty try to find out what is making the Peters family act so hostile. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: A young bank teller is in trouble after a beautiful woman robs the bank. Annie steps in to try and prove the young bank tellers innocence. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. programme.desc: Annie and Lofty attempt to help Ralph and Mary claim a fertile piece of land after a section of land is opened for settlement. programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.
